text:
Здравейте,

 

Моля за издаване на фактура на PPC По приложения файл

 

С най-добри пожелания,                                                   

Елена Ковачки

Администрация и Бек Офис                                             

Моб: +359 893 659 834                                                                                                                                                

www.tibiel.com <http://www.tibiel.com/>      

ТИБИЕЛ ЕООД    



                                                              

 

From: Stoyan Vasilev <s.vasilev@tibiel.com> 
Sent: Friday, November 29, 2024 9:49 AM
To: Athanasios Karantzis <akarantzis@tibiel.com>; Backoffice <Backoffice@tibiel.com>
Subject: ppc invoice draft 26-28NOV

 

Dear colleagues,

 

Attached to this email you will find the invoice draft for PPC covering the period 26-28 NOV. 

 

Please proceed with the issuance of an invoice. I would like to put a slight remark here, we had a day of irregular service fee (1500mwh x 0.5eur), so I suggest that you state the service fee as QTY 1, total amount of 1800eur.

 

 

				 

 

	INVOICE format

		 

 

				 

 

No

Description of Goods/Services

Quantity MWh

Amount EUR

 

1

Natural Gas at VTP - Gas Days 26-28 Nov 2024

1

209 297.33

 

 

2

Service Fee 

1

€ 1 800.00

 

 

3

BGH Fee 4500*0,025

1

€ 112.50

 

 

				 

 

				 

 

		Total of Invoice

€ 211 209.83

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Kind Regards,

Stoyan Vasilev

Natural Gas Trading Department

Mob: +359 892 340 167

www.tibiel.com/en <http://www.tibiel.com/en> 

Tibiel L.t.d.
